resources.string: A collection of helper libraries which provide a consistent experience across all versions of android.
A layout which allows you to create complex layouts with a flat hierarchy.
A static, compile-time dependency injection framework for Java and Android.
Activates code generation and generates implementations to manage a Dagger 2 graph.
An image loading and caching library for Android focused on smooth scrolling.
A simple, flexible library for complex RecyclerView layouts.
An OSS statically typed programming language that targets the JVM, Android, JavaScript and Native, supporting both functional and object-oriented styles of programming.
A JAR required by the Kotlin runtime component when using reflection features on the Java platform.
The components are a collection of widgets which help developers execute Material Design.
A memory leak detection library for Android and Java.
Allows for LeakCanary to be used with the Android Support Library Fragment.
Allows for LeakCanary to be used in release builds
A set of components which allows developers to write code which is aware of and can change in response to the lifecycle of components such as Activity and Fragment.
An annotation processor for the AndroidX Lifecycle Extensions.
A modern JSON library for Android and Java, making it easy to parse JSON into Java objects and vice-versa.
Kotlin Fragment extensions wrapper around the Android navigation component, which allows developers to implement navigation via a modern API.
Kotlin UI extensions wrapper around the Android navigation component, which allows developers to implement navigation via a modern API.
An OkHttp interceptor which logs HTTP request and response data.
A library for extracting colours from images.
A flexible view for providing a limited window into a large data set.
A type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java which turns your HTTP API into a Java interface.
A Retrofit Converter which uses Moshi for serialization to and from JSON.
An RxJava 2 CallAdapter.Factory implementation for Retrofit 2.
Provides an abstraction layer over SQLite to allow fluent database access while harnessing the full power of SQLite.
A lightweight Android library for building reactive apps by modelling Unidrectional data flow.
Android specific bindings for RxJava 2 providing a Scheduler that schedules on the Android main thread.
A library for composing asynchronous and event-based programs using observable sequences for the Java VM.
RxJava bindings for Kotlin - contains extension functions which provide a more idiomatic Kotlin API for RxJava.
A set of RxJava types that are both an Observable and a Consumer.
A logger with a small, extensible API which provides utility on top of Android\'s normal Log class.
